Html:
Hello,

I'm using a 2013 version of MS Word and this tool perfectly works with small sized doc files.
I'm trying to work with a 50MB file which has more than 200 pages and a bunch of pictures, and marking works but when I try to redact document, the Word program shuts down.
Are there any solution to this problem?

Yikes - that's unfortunate. Are you familiar enough with VBA to try to see if ActiveDocument.WordOpenXML works on that large file? That's how I clone the file, and I'm wondering if that's failing somehow..
